Vredestein

(Sep 2019. Enschede, The Netherlands.)

"Project collaboration between Aalto University and Posti to revolutionize the e-commerce segment."

During three month my team "Team 11" analyse the Vredestein brand and come up with new ideas to improve it. It was a project collaboration between the University of Twente and Vredestein, one of the oldest tyre company in Europe Finland. The main objective of the team was to improve the Vredestein brand strategy and bring new ideas and advice.

The team was challenged to improve the current brand strategy with the only limitation that technology has to ve involved in the final solution. Then, the team was able to present an idea that improves Vredestain first impression on the Internet. With all this into account, the team started to work to bring Vredestein brand renovation but to be able to do that we should go thought this three steps.

The problem

The project intended to teach the overall of analysing a specific company brand and bring up new ideas to impro it. brand. Therefore, we needed to start searching for information and analyse it, going through all the stages of the procedure.

  1. Research: The objective of the research was to get to know the brand, target customer segments and the current brand image of Vredestein to then be able to conclude suggestions for the new brand proposition.
  2. Reframed brand proposition: This section introduces a reframed brand proposition for Vredestein. The goal is to support Vredestein in expressing its values of “freedom”, “innovation” and “premium” which the brand possesses, however currently fails to communicate adequately.
  3. Brand proposition applied: The reframed brand proposition is only useful if it is actively applied in both the online as well as offline channels of Vredestein. This section will introduce strategies for the social media channels that are aligned with the tone of voice and the goal to communicate Vredesteins’ brand strengths.

Result

After going thought all this step, the result that Team 11 bring was to renovate the communication strategy of the grand on the internet. To reach this goal, the team presents two ideas. The first idea was to improve its presence in social media and redesign a new strategy. Some of the recommendations were to interconnect social media channels, improve their partnerships and increase the interaction with the costumers. The second solution was to redesign the website experience and bring a modern and more user-friendly interface.

My role

My main motivation for this project came from the idea to start a project in a file that I never worked before. During the process, all the teamwork really hard and experience the process of analysing a company brand and research the customer point of view.

As a team member, I participated in all the process mentioned previously and play my role as a UX/UI designer. From all my work I feel proud that the team decided to give me the task of designing and develop the website. Also, I am very happy with the final result with the webpage, one of the employees of Vredestein told us that would take into account the website recommendations and new design proposed.

Website

The software used on this project to present the new web was Wix, the end up result was the following prototype:
